text:
Hi,

In bin/report-template there are a lot of useless file (ks & css not used, source code...)

I have remove them and the size have decrease in a HTML report test from 7.4Mo to 3.4Mo

Antonio
creator: ra0077@gmail.com

text:
Hi Antonio,
But does the removal allow easy upgrade of JS frameworks used ?

Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
ra0077@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to Philippe Mouawad from comment #1)
> Hi Antonio,
> But does the removal allow easy upgrade of JS frameworks used ?
> 
> Thanks

The JS framework have not been upgraded from years. I am studying to replace it by a new framework, but before I will made some updates

Antonio

creator: ra0077@gmail.com
